com.guimonsters.client

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guimonsters.client.GameObject
      • com.guimonsters.client.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character

    public class Actor
extends GameObject
    Master Class for all game characters.
    Version:
    1.00, 2013-04-18
    Author:
    Elijah Atkinson, Stephen Butler

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor(java.lang.String name,
     java.lang.String description,
     java.lang.String location,
     java.lang.String profession,
     java.lang.String race,
     java.lang.String sex,
     int level,
     int visibilityLevel)
        Create a new actor instance. Actor is the master class for NPCs and player Characters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the actor.
        description - A longer description of the actor.
        location - The location in the game world where the actor resides.
        profession - The "Class" of the actor, i.e. Mage, rogue, etc.
        race - The race of the actor, "Human", "Elf", "Kobold", etc.
        sex - The sex of the actor: Male, Female.
        level - The level of the actor for combat uses.
        visibilityLevel - How visible the actor is.

      • Actor

        public Actor(java.lang.String name,
     java.lang.String description,
     java.lang.String location,
     java.lang.String profession,
     java.lang.String race,
     java.lang.String sex,
     int level)
        Overloaded actor class for actors with normal visibility by default.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the actor.
        description - A longer description of the actor.
        location - The location in the game world where the actor resides.
        profession - The "Class" of the actor, i.e. Mage, rogue, etc.
        race - The race of the actor, "Human", "Elf", "Kobold", etc.
        sex - The sex of the actor: Male, Female.
        level - The level of the actor for combat uses.
